findings.title: Missing Scalar Field Range Check in Scalar Multiplication
findings.description: The scalar multiplication functions `point_mul` and `point_acc_mul` do not check if the scalar `s` is less than the scalar field modulus `r_mod`, which can cause unintended behavior of the contract.

findings.title: Missing Public Inputs Range Check
findings.description: The public input array of uint256 numbers lacks a check to ensure each input is less than the SNARK scalar field modulus r_mod, which can cause scalar field overflow and verification contract failure.

findings.title: Missing Field Element Check and on Curve Point Check for Proof Elements
findings.description: The proof elements lack prime field element checks and on-curve point checks, which can lead to unintended behavior of the verification contract. Although ECCADD, ECCMUL, and ECCParing precompiles perform these checks, they consume gas on revert without providing error information.
